SEARCH

Package org.lwjgl.nanovg

@NonnullDefault package org.lwjgl.nanovg
Contains bindings to NanoVG, a small antialiased vector graphics rendering library for OpenGL. It has lean API modeled after HTML5 canvas API. It is aimed to be a practical and fun toolset for building scalable user interfaces and visualizations.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.lwjgl
    The base LWJGL package.
